references.reason: This paper provides a foundational overview of PAC-Bayes theory, which is the core theoretical framework for the current work.
This is a seminal work in PAC-Bayes theory, laying the groundwork for many subsequent contributions, including the current paper.
This paper further develops PAC-Bayes theory by introducing the concept of model averaging, which is crucial for many practical applications.

references.paper_title: A PAC-Bayesian approach to adaptive classification
references.reason: This paper significantly advanced PAC-Bayes theory by introducing a novel approach to adaptive classification.

references.paper_title: PAC-Bayesian Supervised Classification: The Thermodynamics of Statistical Learning
references.reason: This monograph provides a comprehensive and rigorous treatment of PAC-Bayes theory, which is highly influential in the field.
